movie.title: Heartless
movie.description_intro: Jamie Morgan, a young man with a large heart-shaped birthmark on his face, discovers that there are demons on the streets of East London.
movie.description_full: Jamie Morgan, a young man with a large heart-shaped birthmark on his face, discovers that there are demons on the streets of East London.

movies.title: Love in Dangerous Times
movies.summary: With the world in a pandemic, Jason and Sorrel meet on a dating app and build a romance as the situation gets worse.
movies.description_full: With the world in a pandemic, Jason and Sorrel meet on a dating app and build a romance as the situation gets worse.
movies.synopsis: With the world in a pandemic, Jason and Sorrel meet on a dating app and build a romance as the situation gets worse.

movies.title: The Boys of Ghost Town
movies.summary: Danny Ortega is imprisoned for a crime of justice at a very young age. After 17 years in prison, he returns to his town of Houston to find that crime and drugs have overturned what he once called home. When he attempts to rebuild his life, the lust for power overtakes him and launches him into the world that he always dreaded.
movies.description_full: Danny Ortega is imprisoned for a crime of justice at a very young age. movies.title: The Sum of All Fears
movies.summary: When the President of Russia suddenly dies, a man whose politics are virtually unknown succeeds him. This change in political leaders sparks paranoia among American CIA officials, so CIA Director Bill Cabot (Morgan Freeman) recruits young analyst Jack Ryan (Ben Affleck) to supply insight and advice on the situation. Then the unthinkable happens: a nuclear bomb explodes in a US city, and America is quick to blame the Russians.

movies.title: All the Money in the World
movies.title_english: All the Money in the World
movies.title_long: All the Money in the World (2017)
movies.summary: Rome, 1973. Masked men kidnap a teenage boy named John Paul Getty III (Charlie Plummer). His grandfather, Jean Paul Getty (Christopher Plummer), is the richest human in the world, a billionaire oil magnate, but he's notoriously miserly. His favorite grandson's abduction is not reason enough for him to part with any of his fortune. All the Money in the World (2017) follows Gail, (Michelle Williams), Paul's devoted, strong-willed mother, who unlike Getty, has consistently chosen her children over his fortune. Her son's life in the balance with time running out, she attempts to sway Getty even as her son's mob captors become increasingly more determined, volatile and brutal. When Getty sends his enigmatic security man Fletcher Chace (Mark Wahlberg) to look after his interests, he and Gail become unlikely allies in this race against time that ultimately reveals the true and lasting value of love over money..
